ingredients.content: 200 g red radishes, topped and tailed
250 g apple juice, chilled, (no added sugar)

preparations.content: Place apples, radishes, tomatoes and parsley in mixing bowl then blend <b>30 sec/speed 10<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add lemon juice and apple juice then mix <b>20 sec/speed 4<b>. Pour into glasses and serve immediately.
